pageContext.claim: “And [we are] probably spending at least $58 million a year [on WHO], but it's much more than that because then we fund some of the work they do -- which is some good work.”
pageContext.analysis: As of the end of 2019, the U.S. contributed $893 million to WHO — $236 million in assessed contributions and $656 million in voluntary contributions. Trump complains about the WHO but he repeatedly praised China's response to the coronavirus outbreak before the death toll started to mount in the USA. Then he looked for scapegoat.
